articles.title: John Todd, WA football legend and former West Coast Eagles coach, dies aged 86

articles.content:

articles.title: Larry Allen: Dallas Cowboys legend dies aged 52
articles.description: Dallas Cowboys legend and Pro Football Hall of Famer Larry Allen dies aged 52 while on holiday in Mexico.
articles.content:
The Cowboys said in a statement: "Larry, known for his great athleticism and incredible strength, was one of the most respected, accomplished offensive linemen to ever play in the NFL.

articles.title: EA’s College Football 25 has tons of new features unique to college
